class_notes: The delivery format listed for this class is based on current university guidelines. However, if there are further changes to the COVID19 guidelines for Fall 2021 or other acts beyond our control, the school reserves the right the modify the delivery method for this class
course_description: Data management is the foundation of data-driven enterprises and a cornerstone for business analytics. Through this course, students will gain competence in practical database, data warehousing, and data management skills with emphasis on query, data modeling, ETL, and data management and they will also become familiar with major elements of the big data ecosystem.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the MSBA program.
sections: Class Nbr: 2811, Section #: 4101, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: R. Garg, Status: Open
